subject: Halls of Fame
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Lindsay Davenport was joined by Chantal Vandierendonck, a five-time Paralympic medalist; Jane Brown Grimes, the tennis executive; the coach Nick Bollettieri; and the broadcaster John Barrett.
snippet: Lindsay Davenport was joined by Chantal Vandierendonck, a five-time Paralympic medalist; Jane Brown Grimes, the tennis executive; the coach Nick Bollettieri; and the broadcaster John Barrett.
